msg.msgText: Name Name of the security profile. The name can be a maximum of 32 alphanumeric characters. The first character must not be a number. TLSEnabled Specifies whether Transport Layer Security is enabled. Options:True,False Default:True MinimumProtocolMethod Lowest level of protocol method permitted when connecting. Options:SSLv3,TLSv1,TLSv1.1,TLSv1.2 Default:TLSv1 UseClientCertificate Client certificate authentication. Options:True,False Default:False UsePasswordAuthentication User ID and Password Authentication. Options:True,False Default:True Ciphers Ciphers. Options:Best,Medium,Fast Default:Medium CertificateProfile Name of a certificate profile. UseClientCipher Use Client's Cipher. Options:True,False Default:False LTPAProfile Name of a LTPA profile. OAuthProfile Name of an OAuth profile.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
